Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: First, I need to create two POWL models based on the hiring process description.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Building POWL Models Need to develop two POWL models based on the hiring process description. Focus on key elements like receiving applications, including resumes and questionnaires. Include resume parsing and initial data extraction as critical steps. Ensure models capture the sequence and details of the hiring workflow. Aim to represent the process systematically for analysis and optimization.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Building POWL Models Include automated scanning with loops to request missing information, ensuring data completeness. Feature preliminary skill assessment via online tests, with automatic disqualification below a threshold.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Examining Process Variations Explore XOR choice for cultural fit or community affiliation check, with uplift for certain applicants in Model 1. In Model 2, standardize the process by removing the XOR, ensuring all candidates go through the same cultural fit check.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Defining Model Activities Incorporate activities like receiving applications and resume parsing as starting points for both models.
